interestingFact: Japan has more vending machines than people in some cities!
Australia is wider than the moon!
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
The Great Pyramid of Giza was the tallest man-made structure for over 3,800 years.
India is the birthplace of chess!
Norway introduced salmon sushi to the world.
Italy has the most UNESCO World Heritage Sites in the world.
Kenya is home to the Great Wildebeest Migration, one of the largest animal migrations on Earth.
